Text: This doesn't appear to be cracked correctly. It will tell you its registered, but when you rip a DVD it gives you the DVDFab overlay on the ripped video which is something it only does for unregistered software.

Ignore my last comment, it was user error. You have to block the .exe file in your firewall from communicating out. Once you do this, it works great  and no overlay. Sorry for the error and thanks for the great post!
